segments.text: Come and sit down . Would you like a drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes please ! I'd love a gin and tonic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you like olives ? Or would you prefer crisps ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , just olives please . What music is this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you like it ? It's Irish music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's great ! Where did you get the CD ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Arm - I think it was in the CD shop in the Mall . Have you been there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I buy a lot of stuff from there . It's a good shop , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Hey , I've got some photos of our holiday in Ireland . Would you like to see them ?
segments.speaker: S1
